byline.contributor: Sewell Chan and Christopher D. Shea contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The resignation of Mr. Faymann threw the country into deeper uncertainty amid a rightward political shift fueled by anxiety over migration.

headline.print_headline: Austrian Chancellor Resigns Abruptly Amid Surge in Right-Wing Sentiment
headline.main: Austrian Chancellor, Werner Faymann, Resigns as Right Wing Rises

snippet: The resignation of Mr. Faymann threw the country into deeper uncertainty amid a rightward political shift fueled by anxiety over migration.
abstract: Austrian Chancellor Werner Faymann resigns following Freedom Party candidate Norbert Hofer's first-round victory in presidential election.
